allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Initial commit: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook

This repository contains a comprehensive textbook on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics, featuring:

- 13-week curriculum covering ROS 2, simulation environments, perception, and VLA integration
- Module-based structure with weekly breakdowns
- Practical examples and exercises
- Hardware appendix and troubleshooting guide

Built with Docusaurus for interactive documentation.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>")
Bash(bash -c "cd ''/d/physical-ai and huminiod-robotics/huminiod-robotics/textbook-repo'' && pwd && rm -rf .git node_modules && ls -la")
Bash(bash -c "cd ''/d/physical-ai and huminiod-robotics/huminiod-robotics/textbook-repo'' && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .git && ls -la")

Bash(bash -c "cd ''/d/physical-ai and huminiod-robotics/huminiod-robotics/textbook-repo'' && git init && git config user.name ''Claude Code'' && git config user.email ''claude-code@anthropic.com'' && git add . && git commit -m ''Initial commit: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Textbook

This repository contains a comprehensive textbook on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics, featuring:

- 13-week curriculum covering ROS 2, simulation environments, perception, and VLA integration
- Module-based structure with weekly breakdowns
- Practical examples and exercises
- Hardware appendix and troubleshooting guide

Built with Docusaurus for interactive documentation.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")
Bash(bash -c "cd ''/d/physical-ai and huminiod-robotics/huminiod-robotics/textbook-repo'' && ls -la && echo ''---'' && ls -la docs/")

Bash(bash -c "cd ''/d/physical-ai and huminiod-robotics/huminiod-robotics/textbook-repo'' && rm -f docusaurus.config.ts && rm -f docs/intro.md && rm -rf docs/tutorial-basics docs/tutorial-extras blog")
Bash(bash -c "cd ''/d/physical-ai and huminiod-robotics/huminiod-robotics/textbook-repo'' && git add . && git commit -m ''Clean up default Docusaurus content, keep only textbook content''")
